title: Deep into Dusk
description: In this multi-award winning pulse-pounder, Detective Gabriel McRay is assigned to a case where he must once again face his inner demons. From the enclaves of the super rich to the kinky underbelly of Los Angeles, women are turning up dead. Only one woman has survived a sadistic killer. She is the beautiful, fragile Tara Samuels. Gabriel identifies with Tara. She’s been victimized… Like him. But Tara is not the vulnerable woman he thinks she is. Embroiled in the world of Tara’s dark fantasy, Gabriel realizes the only way out is to hunt down the murderer, solve the case, and do both before he loses his sanity along with his life. "Deep Into Dusk, has all the ingredients of a hair-raising movie thriller on par with the movie Fatal Attraction as it sucks you into wild intrigue with a very unexpected ending" Shelfpleasures.com2014 IPPY Award WinnerNamed Shelf Unbound's 2013 Notable Page-Turner
author: Laurie Stevens
